column1: Nope. The reason is because your US "Government" is bloody useless. On another note; remember when Trump said Corona virus probably isn't even a thing and if it was, it probably wouldn't even reach the US? Yeah... that hadn't aged well...

People can shout all they want about ‘selfish’ people in Clapham Common. This was my local ice cream parlour - non stop queues from 2-5pm - very little organisation. Our politicians not people lost control of Coronavirus some time ago. If fact they’ve never had control.

Everyone knows that if you use the word 'racism' in the USA it has a mobilising force. The guy that committed the crime has been sacked and now will face trial. These are social riots due to the wider coronavirus social malaise and 'racism' long got lost in it all ages ago.
